Scene:
The Earthen Bridge (See also The Earthen Bridge from ""The Trouble in the Date Household"")
(Dobashi (See also Dobashi from ""Meiboku sendaihagi"") / 土橋)

Play: The Story of Kasane (薫樹累物語)

Production: July 1976

– Click image to view.
